overview: The hot brunette Athina needs to get in shape, so nothing better than an intensive course of Pilates. However, bearing in mind that the teacher is Juan Lucho, don’t be surprised if the exercises will consist mainly of sucking and breathing, pelvic muscle development, wiggling, flexible hip movement and swallowing. We find Amirah Adara, Amber Nevada and the tremendous Alexa Tomas all in the same situation, although these girls really don’t need to worry about their figures too much as they are already just perfect. The same goes for Jenny Glam but a bit of a work-out based on blowjobs and an occasional dose of anal sex never did anyone any harm!
title: Pilates Deep Sessions
